comments:
build i0128-0800, winxp, j9sc20031212

I had just started up Eclipse (trying to reproduce another bug) and I made
changes in an open Java editor. I don't remember if I hit ctrl-s to save or if I
chose Revert from the context menu. I was presented with a dialog "Save failed:
null".
